name: Hemantha Wickramaratne
bio: Ranasinghe Pattikirikoralalage Aruna Hemantha Wickramaratne (born February 21, 1971, Colombo), or Hemantha Wickramaratne, is a former Sri Lankan cricketer who played three ODIs in 1993. He made his Twenty20 debut on 17 August 2004, for Sinhalese Sports Club in the 2004 SLC Twenty20 Tournament.[1] In November 2018, he was named on Sri Lanka Cricket's National Selection Panel.[2]
